Subject: Extreme Level
Message-ID: <8ncpum+uro7@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 839
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

Guys, I have created an extreme (beyond difficult) level, but I can 
not seem to beat it yet, but I have held everything in check, with 
spec generated well over 10 million.  I have played it for over 1
hour 
and still unable to beat it at skirmish.  I left it with exactly 1 
slime left.

The goal of the level is to build lots of experience for every team 
member.  I have been playing it with 1 mage, 1 archmage, and 2 
clerics.

I spent over 150 million to create a team of one archer to beat the 
level.  He had experience level of 500 and everything else had a
level 
of 1000 and he was unable to win (in fact, he kept dying).

The level is in a zipped file at 
http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scen350.zip .  You will need to skip 
over to level 350 to play it.

If anyone can tell me what would take to beat that level, let me know.
